line_1: In long procession swept the vaulted aisle,
line_2: And Faith midst dying agonies could smile;

line_1: The massive columns form the lengthen'd aisle;
line_2: And proudly crown the consecrated pile.

line_1: Oft have you met me in yon cloister'd aisle,
line_2: The half-tear starting through the troubl'd smile;

line_1: "You I shall miss! through every lengthening aisle
line_2: Your heavenly presence sacred made the pile;
